name: Monkey.D.Luffy
effect:
[On Play] DON!! −10: Place all of your Characters except this Character at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, take an extra turn after this one.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] ➀ (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.): Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
